title: Drawing, "Project: Sofa", 1800–20
medium: Graphite, pen and black ink, brush and gray watercolors
inscribed:
At left the signature: "Fratelli Santi"
Below the scale:  "Palmi...Romani"
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
description: At left: the elevation of three sections with the arms at left.  At right:  the left end.  The sections are bordered below by the legs, at the back by tripods.  The upholstery has a frieze, divided in panels with acanthus scrolls fastened by a wreath, and pilaster strips, above the tripods and the arms, with acanthus leaves.  The arms are supported by half-figures of animals with acanthus scrolls.  Their left legs lie upon a cup.  Colored base strip.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Project: Sofa", 1800–20.
1800–20. Graphite, pen and black ink, brush and gray watercolors. Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund. 1938-88-559.
